text:
! Sorry!
We should have walked more slowly...

There's no need to apologize.
Kaho did her best, and nobody's at fault here.

...But... if only I'd worn my comfortable shoes...
...Amana wouldn't have had to strain herself...

...I understand why you got new shoes to psych yourself up.
And breaking in new shoes is a process, after all.

Do you ever...
feel anxious... Producer-san?

I want to say no, but...
Of course, I do.

When you feel that way...
...What do you do...?

...I try to find something I can trust and rely on.
It gives me courage.

Something you can believe in,
even when you're overwhelmed by anxiety.
I'm sure you have that in your heart too, Amana.

I think I'll talk to Chiyuki-san
and Tenka-chan about how I feel now.
